report.title: Track a tree: Locations list plus a sublocation count
report.description: A list of Sites, plus a count of the Trees (child locations) associated with it. Allocation of users is at a site level.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttl1 ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.parent_id IS NULL AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR t.term='#location_type_id#') #order_by#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

column.name: count
column.sql: (SELECT count(*) FROM locations sl WHERE sl.parent_id = l.id AND sl.deleted=FALSE)
